title: Youta Vegetarian
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Thai, Buffet, Fast food, Take-out
description: The name Youta is a vegetarian mock-meat producer, so many restaurants in Thailand have the Youta banner. The place is about 1 km before the Myanmar border, on the main road. The people here speak only Thai. The place is clean, and it offers an assortment of 5-6 different ready-made vegetables and mock-meats dishes - point to which one you want. Sells a number of prepackaged food items such as TVP, dry noodles, canned mock-meat.
